index.html.keywords: This is the HOMEPAGE. Refer to Markdown for how to write markdown files. Quick Start Notes: Add images to the images folder if the file is referencing an image.

templates/README.html.title: DiscordFX | MARBLE Wiki
templates/README.html.keywords: DiscordFX DocFX template to create documentation similar to Discord Live Demo Installation Download the source or the zipped file from the releases page. In your DocFX project folder, create a new directory named templates, if it doesn't already exist. Copy the discordfx folder from this repository into your templates folder. In your docfx.json configuration file, add templates/discordfx path into build.template property { "build": { "template": ["default", "templates/discordfx"] } } Customization Colors You can change any color which are used by the template. They are defined in the styles/colors.css file. To change it, just override the value in your own styles/main.css file for example.
